status_legend.0: Normal Operation - The turbine is in normal power production mode
status_legend.1: Derated Operation - Derated power generation with a power restriction
status_legend.2: Idling - Asset is idling and waits to operate again
status_legend.3: Service - Asset is in service mode / service team is at the site
status_legend.4: Downtime - Asset is down due a fault or other reasons

summary: Over this 6‑hour window the turbine spent all 37 ten‑minute intervals in **Downtime**, with **near‑zero and extremely steady power output** (power_mean ≈ 0.9755, power_std ≈ 0.0002) and **no rotor speed variation** (rotor_rpm_std = 0.0) while generator speed showed only minor variability. Environmental and operating indicators show **high and variable wind** (wind_speed_mean ≈ 15.74 with a max of 36.8), **persistent negative power residuals** (mean ≈ −0.1117), and **elevated temperatures** (temp_mean ≈ 67.0), with moderate pitch (~10.65) and low average yaw misalignment (~1.58).
